description: This episode opens up with Rikuo and his Night Parade going to the summit of the Forest of Torii. Once at the summit Awashima picks up a rock and unknown to anyone in the group except Kuroutabo is instantly tagged to be spirited away. After the parade walks a little further in the torii Awashima is spirited away by a boy and the Nijunanamen Senjuu Mukade. So Awashima is spirited away by Mukade and the boy. Once in the realm of Mukade Awashima leg is grabbed and pulled into a small torii. She sees an arm come out of one of the torii and try to cut her head off. It misses and immediately goes to cut off her leg. After a bit of Awashima getting sliced to ribbons with Mukade`s arms coming out of all the mini torii. She is given a glimmer of hope when Kurotabo pierces Mukade`s world but is unable to help any further. Awashima then remembers what Amezo said to him about some youkai being invinceible in their own territories, and that when that happens find the source of their power and stop it. Awashima realizing that the more the boy cries the stronger Mukade gets she goes over and conforts the boy making Mukade lose his fear. Then with a quick dance she defeats Mukade and leaves the Forest of The Lost only to realize no one knew she was gone. Then Hidemoto comes and sees Rikuo and tells the Night Parade what they have to do to defeat Hagoromo-Gitsune.
